title: Shokupan Mimi
synopsis: The story is about the daily life of a piece of bread named Mimi, and some of her friends and family. Based on Shimamori Natsuko's Shokupan Mimi (White Bread Mimi) 4-panel manga.
voices: ['Tomioka, Misako', 'Miyazaki, Ui', 'Nogawa, Sakura', 'Gotou, Saori', 'Morishima, Shuuta', 'Hirayama, Emi']
